<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Inspect an eh-frame CFI record.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/ehframecfiblockinspector"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">EHFrameCFIBlockInspector &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Identify CFI record type and edges based on number and order of edges</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// in the given block only. This assumes that the block contains one CFI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// record that has already been split out and fixed by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// DWARFRecordSplitter and EHFrameEdgeFixer passes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Zero or one outgoing edges: Record is CIE. If present, edge points to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// personality.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Two or three outgoing edges: Record is an FDE. First edge points to CIE,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// second to PC-begin, third (if present) to LSDA.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// It is illegal to call this function on a block with four or more edges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EHFrameCFIBlockInspector <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/ehframecfiblockinspector/#ad58e7c9140c2bee787d0e5f8f253af89">FromEdgeScan</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/block">Block</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns true if this frame is an FDE, false for a CIE.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/ehframecfiblockinspector/#ac10e058969be40f8f634bd1783e5b1e5"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/ehframecfiblockinspector/#ac10e058969be40f8f634bd1783e5b1e5">isFDE</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CIEEdge != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns true if this frame is a CIE, false for an FDE.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/ehframecfiblockinspector/#a5209b3defc29c58a86d0f6731d3f20b7"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/ehframecfiblockinspector/#a5209b3defc29c58a86d0f6731d3f20b7">isCIE</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CIEEdge == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If this is a CIE record, returns the Edge pointing at the personality</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// function, if any.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// It is illegal to call this method on FDE records.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/ehframecfiblockinspector/#a6a9aed8bcac31d30ce314b92154192c6"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/edge">Edge</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/ehframecfiblockinspector/#a6a9aed8bcac31d30ce314b92154192c6">getPersonalityEdge</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/ehframecfiblockinspector/#a607339cf573f4f14cfd193b6348e7325">PersonalityEdge</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If this is an FDE record, returns the Edge pointing to the CIE.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If this is a CIE record, returns null.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The result is not valid if any modification has been made to the block</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// symbol.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If this a CIE record, returns null.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/ehframecfiblockinspector/#a06ca0b76a20d6fb25263443f0c2a4392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/edge">Edge</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/ehframecfiblockinspector/#a06ca0b76a20d6fb25263443f0c2a4392">getPCBeginEdge</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PCBeginEdge; &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Creates a pass that records the address and size of the EH frame section.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If no eh-frame section is found then the address and size will both be given</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// as zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Authors of JITLinkContexts can use this function to register a post-fixup</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// pass that records the range of the eh-frame section. This range can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// be used after finalization to register and deregister the frame.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/jitlink/#a00c066d790481f29c26588193ee3a35e">LinkGraphPassFunction</a></span></CodeLine>
